20110109060032.000|20110109065945.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110109060032.000|20110109060034.000|CC1|>> ON THE NIGHT OF AUGUST 16,   
20110109060034.000|20110109060036.000|CC1|2009, I WAS RETURNING HOME FROM 
20110109060036.000|20110109060039.000|CC1|VACATION WITH MY FAMILY WHEN I  
20110109060039.000|20110109060040.000|CC1|RECEIVED THE PHONE CALL FROM MY 
20110109060040.000|20110109060041.000|CC1|LIEUTENANT, WHO TOLD ME THAT    
20110109060041.000|20110109060043.000|CC1|THERE WAS A STABBING OVER ON    
20110109060043.000|20110109060049.000|CC1|STAFFORD ROAD.                  
20110109060049.000|20110109060050.000|CC1|WHEN I ARRIVED AT THE SCENE, I  
20110109060050.000|20110109060051.000|CC1|TALKED WITH SOME OF THE OTHER   
20110109060051.000|20110109060053.000|CC1|OFFICERS.                       
20110109060053.000|20110109060055.000|CC1|THEY SAID THAT SANDRA FRANKLIN, 
20110109060055.000|20110109060056.000|CC1|THE WIFE, WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR   
20110109060056.000|20110109060057.000|CC1|STABBING DR. FRANKLIN IN THE    
20110109060057.000|20110109060101.000|CC1|CHEST.                          
20110109060101.000|20110109060103.000|CC1|I'M DETECTIVE SERGEANT ANDY     
20110109060103.000|20110109060104.000|CC1|KELLY WITH BAINBRIDGE POLICE    
20110109060104.000|20110109060105.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT IN GEAUGA COUNTY,    
20110109060105.000|20110109060108.000|CC1|OHIO.                           
20110109060108.000|20110109060109.000|CC1|SHE WAS BROUGHT BACK TO THE     
20110109060109.000|20110109060110.000|CC1|STATION BY ONE OF OUR OFFICERS. 
20110109060110.000|20110109060112.000|CC1|HER PHOTOGRAPH WAS TAKEN.       
20110109060112.000|20110109060114.000|CC1|FROM THERE, SHE WAS BROUGHT UP  
20110109060114.000|20110109060115.000|CC1|TO THE INTERVIEW ROOM.          
20110109060115.000|20110109060117.000|CC1|HI, I'M SERGEANT KELLY.         
20110109060117.000|20110109060117.000|CC1|THIS ISN'T A CASE OF WHO DONE   
20110109060117.000|20110109060118.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110109060118.000|20110109060125.000|CC1|SHE ADMITTED SHE STABBED HIM.   
20110109060125.000|20110109060125.000|CC1|BUT NOW WE NEEDED TO FIND OUT   
20110109060125.000|20110109060126.000|CC1|HOW THIS OCCURRED, WHY IT       
20110109060126.000|20110109060132.000|CC1|OCCURRED...                     
20110109060132.000|20110109060133.000|CC1|>> HE SMACKED ME HARD, HE       
20110109060133.000|20110109060133.000|CC1|KNOCKED ME AROUND.              
20110109060133.000|20110109060134.000|CC1|>> ...AND WHO WAS THE PRIMARY   
20110109060134.000|20110109060135.000|CC1|AGGRESSOR IN THIS CASE.         
20110109060135.000|20110109060136.000|CC1|>> THEN HE PUT IT AND SAID "I'LL
20110109060136.000|20110109060136.000|CC1|KILL YOU."                      
20110109060136.000|20110109060137.000|CC1|I LOVED PETER AND PETER LOVED   
20110109060137.000|20110109060144.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110109060144.000|20110109060145.000|CC1|AT LEAST I THOUGHT HE DID.      
20110109060145.000|20110109060147.000|CC1|IT ALL HAPPENED SO FAST.        
20110109060147.000|20110109060148.000|CC1|ONE WORD LEADS TO ANOTHER AND HE
20110109060148.000|20110109060149.000|CC1|HITS ME.                        
20110109060149.000|20110109060150.000|CC1|HE WAS IN THE PROCESS OF        
20110109060150.000|20110109060152.000|CC1|ATTACKING ME.                   
20110109060152.000|20110109060153.000|CC1|I GRABBED A KNIFE.              
20110109060153.000|20110109060159.000|CC1|I WAS NOT WIELDING IT AT HIM.   
20110109060159.000|20110109060200.000|CC1|HE WAS ANGRY AND HE WAS         
20110109060200.000|20110109060200.000|CC1|SWEATING, AND I'M BACKED UP TO  
20110109060200.000|20110109060201.000|CC1|THE SINK.                       
20110109060201.000|20110109060202.000|CC1|ANYBODY IN THAT LAUNDRY ROOM AT 
20110109060202.000|20110109060202.000|CC1|THAT TIME WOULD HAVE DONE THE   
20110109060202.000|20110109060209.000|CC1|SAME THING.                     
20110109060209.000|20110109060210.000|CC1|AND I WINCED AND I WENT LIKE    
20110109060210.000|20110109060217.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110109060217.000|20110109060218.000|CC1|>> IT WAS TOO EARLY AT THAT     
20110109060218.000|20110109060220.000|CC1|POINT TO DRAW A CONCLUSION, BUT 
20110109060220.000|20110109060221.000|CC1|SOME OF HER STORY JUST WASN'T   
20110109060221.000|20110109060223.000|CC1|MATCHING UP.                    
20110109060223.000|20110109060224.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO SIGNS OF ANY       
20110109060224.000|20110109060229.000|CC1|PHYSICAL VIOLENCE IN THE HOUSE. 
20110109060229.000|20110109060229.000|CC1|SHE SAID THAT SHE WAS SLAPPED IN
20110109060229.000|20110109060230.000|CC1|THE FACE, KNOCKED TO THE GROUND.
20110109060230.000|20110109060231.000|CC1|SHE SAID SHE HAD THIS BIG RED   
20110109060231.000|20110109060232.000|CC1|MARK.                           
20110109060232.000|20110109060232.000|CC1|I DIDN'T SEE IT AT ALL.         
20110109060232.000|20110109060233.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO MARK WHATSOEVER.   
20110109060233.000|20110109060234.000|CC1|>> MY INTENT WAS TO JUST GET OUT
20110109060234.000|20110109060235.000|CC1|OF A DANGEROUS SITUATION.       
20110109060235.000|20110109060236.000|CC1|>> SHE ATTACKED HIM.            
20110109060236.000|20110109060237.000|CC1|>> THERE'S NO RATIONAL REASON   
20110109060237.000|20110109060240.000|CC1|FOR ME TO DO THIS.              
20110109060240.000|20110109060240.000|CC1|I DON'T HAVE ANY MOTIVE TO KILL 
20110109060240.000|20110109060241.000|CC1|MY HUSBAND.                     
20110109060241.000|20110109060246.000|CC1|>> IT IS A CASE OF MURDER.      
20110109060246.000|20110109060247.000|CC1|>> HE HAD HAD THE KEYS SHOVED UP
20110109060247.000|20110109060247.000|CC1|AGAINST MY THROAT, SAYING HE WAS
20110109060247.000|20110109060248.000|CC1|GOING TO KILL ME.               
20110109060248.000|20110109060250.000|CC1|I'M NOT GOING TO DIE.

20110109060517.000|20110109060519.000|CC1|>> OKAY, WHAT'S YOUR ADDRESS?   
20110109060519.000|20110109060521.000|CC1|>> 9495 STAFFORD.               
20110109060521.000|20110109060523.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ...56-YEAR-OLD     
20110109060523.000|20110109060524.000|CC1|SANDRA FRANKLIN CALLS POLICE TO 
20110109060524.000|20110109060528.000|CC1|REPORT A VIOLENT CONFRONTATION. 
20110109060528.000|20110109060528.000|CC1|>> YOU STABBED HIM WITH WHAT?   
20110109060528.000|20110109060529.000|CC1|>> WITH A KNIFE, A KITCHEN      
20110109060529.000|20110109060532.000|CC1|KNIFE.                          
20110109060532.000|20110109060533.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AS PARAMEDICS AND  
20110109060533.000|20110109060536.000|CC1|POLICE IN BAINBRIDGE, OHIO,     
20110109060536.000|20110109060537.000|CC1|RUSHED TO SANDRA'S HORSE FARM,  
20110109060537.000|20110109060538.000|CC1|ODDLY, A SECOND CALL COMES IN   
20110109060538.000|20110109060542.000|CC1|FROM THE SAME ADDRESS.          
20110109060542.000|20110109060543.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S THE PROBLEM THERE?    
20110109060543.000|20110109060545.000|CC1|>> STAB WOUND.                  
20110109060545.000|20110109060546.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS ONE FROM THE  
20110109060546.000|20110109060548.000|CC1|VICTIM HIMSELF.                 
20110109060548.000|20110109060549.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE STABBED WITH A KNIFE? 
20110109060549.000|20110109060550.000|CC1|WHO STABBED YOU?                
20110109060550.000|20110109060553.000|CC1|>> MY WIFE.                     
20110109060553.000|20110109060555.000|CC1|>> 73-YEAR-OLD PETER FRANKLIN.  
20110109060555.000|20110109060558.000|CC1|HE STUMBLED INTO THE BACKYARD   
20110109060558.000|20110109060558.000|CC1|BLEEDING HEAVILY FROM A SINGLE  
20110109060558.000|20110109060603.000|CC1|STAB WOUND TO THE CHEST.        
20110109060603.000|20110109060603.000|CC1|>> DID SHE DO IT INTENTIONALLY? 
20110109060603.000|20110109060607.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110109060607.000|20110109060607.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WITHIN HOURS, PETER
20110109060607.000|20110109060608.000|CC1|FRANKLIN WAS DEAD AND HIS WIFE  
20110109060608.000|20110109060610.000|CC1|SANDRA WAS CHARGED WITH HIS     
20110109060610.000|20110109060613.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110109060613.000|20110109060614.000|CC1|>> I'M ABSOLUTELY NOT A         
20110109060614.000|20110109060617.000|CC1|MURDERER.                       
20110109060617.000|20110109060617.000|CC1|THERE ISN'T A DAY THAT GOES BY  
20110109060617.000|20110109060620.000|CC1|THAT I DON'T CRY.               
20110109060620.000|20110109060621.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT WHAT COULD HAVE
20110109060621.000|20110109060622.000|CC1|BROUGHT A LOVING RELATIONSHIP TO
20110109060622.000|20110109060623.000|CC1|THIS?                           
20110109060623.000|20110109060625.000|CC1|>> I STILL LOVE MY HUSBAND.     
20110109060625.000|20110109060626.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SANDRA AND PETER'S 
20110109060626.000|20110109060628.000|CC1|LOVE AFFAIR HAD STARTED NINE    
20110109060628.000|20110109060633.000|CC1|YEARS EARLIER.                  
20110109060633.000|20110109060634.000|CC1|>> HE WAS JUST A FANTASTIC      
20110109060634.000|20110109060640.000|CC1|FIGURE OF A MAN TO ME.          
20110109060640.000|20110109060641.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER SEVERAL      
20110109060641.000|20110109060642.000|CC1|FAILED RELATIONSHIPS, THEY BOTH 
20110109060642.000|20110109060643.000|CC1|FELT THEY'D FINALLY MET THE LOVE
20110109060643.000|20110109060648.000|CC1|OF THEIR LIVES.                 
20110109060648.000|20110109060650.000|CC1|>> HE WAS A DOCTOR, AND I LOVED 
20110109060650.000|20110109060651.000|CC1|THAT ABOUT HIM, TOO-- THAT HE   
20110109060651.000|20110109060655.000|CC1|WAS OUT THERE HELPING PEOPLE.   
20110109060655.000|20110109060657.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN FACT, SINCE HIS 
20110109060657.000|20110109060658.000|CC1|EARLY 20s, PETER FRANKLIN'S     
20110109060658.000|20110109060659.000|CC1|WHOLE LIFE HAD BEEN ABOUT       
20110109060659.000|20110109060705.000|CC1|HELPING OTHERS.                 
20110109060705.000|20110109060707.000|CC1|>> HE WAS A PERSON WHO CARED    
20110109060707.000|20110109060710.000|CC1|DEEPLY FOR OTHER PEOPLE.        
20110109060710.000|20110109060711.000|CC1|HE WANTED TO GO AND LEARN       
20110109060711.000|20110109060711.000|CC1|DIFFERENT THINGS ABOUT DIFFERENT
20110109060711.000|20110109060713.000|CC1|COUNTRIES.                      
20110109060713.000|20110109060714.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LIZ FRANKLIN IS    
20110109060714.000|20110109060717.000|CC1|PETER'S FIRST WIFE.             
20110109060717.000|20110109060718.000|CC1|THEY MET IN HER HOME COUNTRY,   
20110109060718.000|20110109060719.000|CC1|SOUTH AFRICA, WHILE HE WAS IN   
20110109060719.000|20110109060721.000|CC1|THE PEACE CORPS IN THE EARLY    
20110109060721.000|20110109060723.000|CC1|'60s.                           
20110109060723.000|20110109060725.000|CC1|>> AND HE ALSO WANTED TO GO TO  
20110109060725.000|20110109060729.000|CC1|VIETNAM TO HELP SOMEHOW THERE.  
20110109060729.000|20110109060734.000|CC1|( HELICOPTER ROTOR NOISE )      
20110109060734.000|20110109060735.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER THE PEACE    
20110109060735.000|20110109060736.000|CC1|CORPS, PETER DID GO TO VIETNAM, 
20110109060736.000|20110109060739.000|CC1|VOLUNTEERING TO HELP WOUNDED    
20110109060739.000|20110109060742.000|CC1|CHILDREN TRAPPED IN THE WAR     
20110109060742.000|20110109060745.000|CC1|ZONE.                           
20110109060745.000|20110109060746.000|CC1|THE EXPERIENCE INSPIRED HIM TO  
20110109060746.000|20110109060749.000|CC1|BECOME A DOCTOR.                
20110109060749.000|20110109060750.000|CC1|WAS PETER A GOOD MAN?           
20110109060750.000|20110109060751.000|CC1|>> I THINK HE WAS A VERY GOOD   
20110109060751.000|20110109060752.000|CC1|MAN.                            
20110109060752.000|20110109060753.000|CC1|HE COULD DRIVE YOU NUTS, BUT HE 
20110109060753.000|20110109060757.000|CC1|WAS A VERY, VERY GOOD MAN.      
20110109060757.000|20110109060758.000|CC1|PETER FRANKLIN WAS BRILLIANT BUT
20110109060758.000|20110109060759.000|CC1|COULD BE INFURIATING WITH HIS   
20110109060759.000|20110109060805.000|CC1|DETACHMENT.                     
20110109060805.000|20110109060806.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PETER AND LIZ      
20110109060806.000|20110109060807.000|CC1|SETTLED IN A SMALL TOWN JUST    
20110109060807.000|20110109060809.000|CC1|OUTSIDE OF CLEVELAND, OHIO,     
20110109060809.000|20110109060812.000|CC1|WHERE PETER STARTED A FAMILY    
20110109060812.000|20110109060816.000|CC1|MEDICAL PRACTICE.               
20110109060816.000|20110109060818.000|CC1|IN 1965, THE COUPLE HAD A SON,  
20110109060818.000|20110109060820.000|CC1|BROM.                           
20110109060820.000|20110109060831.000|CC1|EVERYONE CALLED HIM BROMIE.     
20110109060831.000|20110109060833.000|CC1|TRAGICALLY, WHILE ON A CAMPING  
20110109060833.000|20110109060835.000|CC1|TRIP WITH HIS FATHER, BROMIE WAS
20110109060835.000|20110109060837.000|CC1|KILLED IN A FREAK ACCIDENT WHILE
20110109060837.000|20110109060838.000|CC1|PLAYING NEAR AN ABANDONED GAS   
20110109060838.000|20110109060841.000|CC1|TANK.                           
20110109060841.000|20110109060845.000|CC1|HE WAS JUST TEN YEARS OLD.      
20110109060845.000|20110109060846.000|CC1|WHAT IMPACT DID BROMIE'S DEATH  
20110109060846.000|20110109060849.000|CC1|HAVE ON PETER?                  
20110109060849.000|20110109060851.000|CC1|>> A HUGE IMPACT.               
20110109060851.000|20110109060852.000|CC1|AND HE WAS VERY, VERY SAD AND   
20110109060852.000|20110109060857.000|CC1|REALLY MISSED HIM VERY MUCH.    
20110109060857.000|20110109060857.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHILE GRIEVING, LIZ
20110109060857.000|20110109060858.000|CC1|BECAME MORE AWARE OF THE ODD    
20110109060858.000|20110109060902.000|CC1|QUIRKS IN PETER'S PERSONALITY.  
20110109060902.000|20110109060903.000|CC1|>> HE DIDN'T FORM ATTACHMENTS   
20110109060903.000|20110109060904.000|CC1|EASILY.                         
20110109060904.000|20110109060906.000|CC1|HE WAS WITHDRAWN AND UNABLE     
20110109060906.000|20110109060908.000|CC1|TO... ACTUALLY UNABLE TO EXPRESS
20110109060908.000|20110109060910.000|CC1|HIS WORDS.                      
20110109060910.000|20110109060911.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER BROMIE'S     
20110109060911.000|20110109060913.000|CC1|DEATH, PETER AND LIZ DRIFTED    
20110109060913.000|20110109060915.000|CC1|APART.                          
20110109060915.000|20110109060916.000|CC1|THE THEIR 17-YEAR-LONG MARRIAGE

20110109062906.000|20110109062907.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AS PETER FRANKLIN

20110109062908.000|20110109062910.000|CC1|HIS HOME, HE MADE ONE LAST      
20110109062910.000|20110109062914.000|CC1|EFFORT TO SAVE HIS OWN LIFE.

20110109062922.000|20110109062923.000|CC1|BLEEDING, HE CLUTCHES A BUNDLE  
20110109062923.000|20110109062928.000|CC1|OF CLOTHING TO HIS CHEST.       
20110109062928.000|20110109062932.000|CC1|>> PETER IS A DYING MAN.

20110109062936.000|20110109062936.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHY DID PETER

20110109062937.000|20110109062938.000|CC1|CALLING 911?

20110109062939.000|20110109062943.000|CC1|WAS GOING TO HELP HIM.          
20110109062943.000|20110109062950.000|CC1|SHE'S NOT A LOVING WIFE WHO     
20110109062950.000|20110109062951.000|CC1|"OH, MY GOD, I MADE A MISTAKE, I
20110109062951.000|20110109062952.000|CC1|STILL LOVE YOU PETER."

20110109062952.000|20110109062953.000|CC1|HOUSE, AND SHE DIDN'T TAKE ANY

20110109062957.000|20110109063000.000|CC1|THERE.

20110109063002.000|20110109063004.000|CC1|SNAVELY BELIEVE THE 911 CALL...

20110109063510.000|20110109063511.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND SANDRA STOOD TO
20110109063511.000|20110109063513.000|CC1|GET EVEN MORE MONEY.

20110109063516.000|20110109063517.000|CC1|MILLION-DOLLAR LIFE INSURANCE

20110109063520.000|20110109063520.000|CC1|>> THAT POLICY WAS DUE TO END IN
20110109063520.000|20110109063522.000|CC1|TWO WEEKS.

20110109063528.000|20110109063532.000|CC1|POLICY WAS PROBABLY NIL.        
20110109063532.000|20110109063534.000|CC1|>> IT WAS ONE OF THOSE THINGS   
20110109063534.000|20110109063536.000|CC1|WHERE ALL OF A SUDDEN THERE'S A 
20110109063536.000|20110109063537.000|CC1|MILLION DOLLARS OUT THERE, AND  
20110109063537.000|20110109063538.000|CC1|HE WAS WORTH MORE TO HER DEAD   
20110109063538.000|20110109063540.000|CC1|THAN ALIVE.                     
20110109063540.000|20110109063546.000|CC1|SHE SAW HER WORLD STARTING TO   
20110109063546.000|20110109063547.000|CC1|TURN, AND AS THE WATER WAS GOING

20110109063559.000|20110109063600.000|CC1|EXPLODED, AND THAT EXPLOSION    
20110109063600.000|20110109063600.000|CC1|UNFORTUNATELY WAS DEATH.        
20110109063600.000|20110109063602.000|CC1|>> Reporter: JUST NINE MONTHS   
20110109063602.000|20110109063602.000|CC1|AFTER PETER'S DEATH, SANDRA'S   
20110109063602.000|20110109063603.000|CC1|TRIAL IS SET TO BEGIN.          
20110109063603.000|20110109063604.000|CC1|>> SANDRA FRANKLIN CAUSED THE   
20110109063604.000|20110109063605.000|CC1|DEATH OF HER HUSBAND, PETER S.  
20110109063605.000|20110109063606.000|CC1|FRANKLIN.                       
20110109063606.000|20110109063607.000|CC1|SHE WANTED TO CHARGE HER WITH   
20110109063607.000|20110109063607.000|CC1|MURDER, THEY DID CHARGE HER WITH
20110109063607.000|20110109063608.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110109063608.000|20110109063609.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HER ATTORNEY, STEVE

20110109065301.000|20110109065302.000|CC1|SANDRA SPENDS WHAT MIGHT BE ONE 
20110109065302.000|20110109065303.000|CC1|OF HER LAST MOMENTS OF FREEDOM  
20110109065303.000|20110109065306.000|CC1|AT HOME WITH HER FRIENDS.       
20110109065306.000|20110109065308.000|CC1|>> I DON'T KNOW IF I'M ANY MORE 
20110109065308.000|20110109065311.000|CC1|ANXIOUS NOW THAN I EVER WAS.    
20110109065311.000|20110109065312.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, IT'S BEEN COMING ON

20110109065427.000|20110109065428.000|CC1|JURY RETURNS TO THE COURTROOM
